www.awwwards.com.

It's an online catalog showcasing the best websites, honoring the creative and innovative works of web designers and developers. Here, you can find numerous examples of creative web design, animations, and visual effects that leave a lasting impression.

WebGL

WebGL brings plugin-free 3D to the web, implemented right into the browser.

OpenGL

At the core of WebGL lies the OpenGL API, which grants access to the hardware capabilities of the user's graphics card.

Three.js

Three.js is an open-source JavaScript library that provides tools for creating and rendering three-dimensional scenes and objects directly in a web browser.

    The three pillars on which Three.js stands are:
  • Scene
  • Camera
  • Renderer

Thank you for joining me on this exploration of Three.js and WebGL.
